long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you like eating food, you know how mayonnaise can make any dish better. Just add mayonnaise to a... pudding and, yes -- now it's superior to pudding, much better!

Every day we face harsh reality which pours on us tons of bad news from internet. There are many shitty websites with shitty content.

But, what if we have some sort of thing like mayonnaise for food, but for Internet, to make it better? To transform bad content into better content? This is exactly why MAYO was created -- to make Internet better.

Just add MAYO to any website and see how it becomes better.


Resources used in this extension:
 * Sound composed from free "Sandyrb Revolting Flatulence" pack by sandyrb
   https://freesound.org/people/sandyrb/packs/6973/

 * Icon of Mayonaise jar from icons8.com
   https://icons8.com/icon/37561/mayonnaise
